title: Google pixel Touch works when you want
content: does my google pixel work touch when you want what it can be? sometimes I turn on the phone and it works normally and after a while it stops accepting ringtone and usually comes back and sometimes I restart until it starts accepting. Pixel 1 usually restarts constantly when the screen stops working, I have already restored from factory, and no use is it q and some short? when the screen works or seems to have problem!
